content:
November 2, 2025: Thank you, CurseForge and Modrinth community! I'm here to announce the final update (v0.4.0) of Stardew Valley Food. This project started back in middle school (2022) as my second mod after Smooth Wood, created with MCreator before I learned Gradle or Maven. Over time, it grew to include 60+ food items ported from Stardew Valley â€” now reaching almost 100k downloads! The 0.4.0 version will be the final and best version, released before I head to university. Thank you so much for all the support through the years!

*(Out of support: Future ports may only include major Minecraft versions like 1.12.2, 1.16.5, 1.17.1, 1.18.2, 1.19.2, 1.20.1, and 1.21.1.)*
June 29, 2025: The Smooth Wood (HD) [Abandoned] resource pack has been updated to support the latest version of Minecraft!
June 29, 2025: Good news! Development on Japan Props will resume. It might take a while, but it's definitely coming back!
June 7, 2025: Taking a long break from development. Experiencing burnout, health issues, and computer problems. Hope to be back soon!
May 19, 2025: Let Your Friend Eating! version 1.0.4 LTS is out! This might be the final major update, with future updates primarily focusing on bug fixes.
May 9, 2025: Stardew Valley Food version 0.3.2 is now available! This is the best version yet, allowing for both NPC trades and crafting recipes simultaneously.
2024: Development on the Smooth Wood (HD) [Abandoned] project has been officially discontinued.
